## `SplashScreen`

Displays the image from the list of splashscreens at the specified index.

### Syntax {-}
``` {.lua}
SplashScreen(number index)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
| `number` index | Index of which image from the list of splashscreens to display. |
:::
